description: Styles for a Tic Tac Toe frontend application, defining layout, colors, and responsive design for various components.

classes.name: app
classes.description: Main container for the application, centers content and sets padding.

classes.name: card
classes.description: Styles for the card component displaying game information.

classes.name: header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the card, including title and status.

classes.name: title
classes.description: Styles for the title text within the header.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styles for the status display within the header.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe game board layout.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares on the Tic Tac Toe board.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Styles for the control buttons, arranging them in a flexible layout.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Styles for buttons used in the application.

classes.name: scoreboard
classes.description: Styles for the scoreboard displaying player scores.

classes.name: score
classes.description: Styles for individual score displays within the scoreboard.
